description:
- 2 extra Posts (LinkedIn/X) - 4/year. 
 - Featured as 'Top provider' for 1 month, 2 times per year: 
 - - on the landing page 
 - - when browsing the catalogue (in 2 categories related to its services). 
 - Banner on the landing page and catalogues for 1 month, 3 times per year. 
 - Promotion in one newsletter.
name: Marketing Promotion - Advanced
